overview:
At the age of 12, Deric got his very first taste of running a business via buying and selling 2nd hand electronic and video games to wholesale exporters. Much to his surprise, he love the idea of building stuff from ground zero and started his journey ever since.

Along the way he founded a web consultancy business, Vaultlabs.com, and has built TheEZSuite.com, an ecommerce platform that enables small and medium business to easily build and grow their business online. Which was nominated as a 2011 Red Herring Top 100 Asia Finalist.

In his earlier life, he has worked with Fortune 500 entities and SME (small and medium enterprise) across Asia Pacific to help build and scale their business. He speaks at regional conferences and already helped companies to successfully build and scale their business.
